name: Sneaky Snake (Hsaka)
description:
It's the classic game of Snake but with one little twist: your body controls the snake!

In this game, you actually have to get up and move in order to make the snake move. Rotate your body to turn the snake's head and walk to move in the direction the head is facing.

Avoid touching the bouncing eyeballs. If you stand still for a little while, you become invulnerable.

This game only works on mobile browsers.
